fields.Title: Interfacing: "This is not something you should be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not something you should be attempting to do with your bare hands. You're just going to get hurt.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Your heartbeat quickens, palms go s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your heartbeat quickens, palms go sweaty... The siren of amphetamine is singing you her song.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shakes his head. "We..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant shakes his head. "We've no business here. Let's get back to the investigation."

fields.Title: Door, Apartment #12: "A shabby door hangs oddly on its hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A shabby door hangs oddly on its hinges, secured to the doorframe with a safety chain. An unpaid energy bill is attached, threatening to cut off the electricity. It's addressed to Mr. Uuno de Ruyter.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks worried. "I kn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks worried. "I know there's no stopping you -- but let's at least make this quick."

fields.Title: You: "Use the cutters on the chain."
fields.Dialogue Text: Use the cutters on the chain.
fields.tooltip2: Won't be beat by a goddamn door.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You'll need to equip the chaincutte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You'll need to equip the chaincutters to enter. Snip right through the metal!

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Good thing you already have the cha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good thing you already have the chaincutters in your hand! Nothing left to do now but *snip-snip*!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant smiles. "Trouble wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant smiles. "Trouble with the chain, officer?"

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Like a goddamn maniac, you rip the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like a goddamn maniac, you rip the chain off the door. The links lie on the floor, scattered.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Snip! The cutter goes through them..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snip! The cutter goes through them like dead leaves. The links fall to the ground on the other side of the door.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Supreme-titanium*?" The lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Supreme-titanium*?" The lieutenant blinks. "Sure. A door inside this complex has super-hard, super-expensive chains."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "It should be easy, but... it's just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It should be easy, but... it's just an awkward angle, okay? The door doesn't *really* open wide enough to really get the cutters through. You can't get the leverage you need. And the cutters are blunt. AND the chain is... just super strong, okay? It's not your fault you can't cut it!

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The apartment numbers have fallen o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The apartment numbers have fallen off the door, leaving the panel with a sticky '1'-shaped shadow and a marker-drawn '2'.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant arches his eyebrows,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant arches his eyebrows, surprised. "Well... no. I guess not."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Stupid chain... Come on, try it aga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stupid chain... Come on, try it again. We won't be defeated so easily!

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Like a goddamn maniac, you rip the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like a goddamn maniac, you rip the chain off the door. The links lie on the floor, scattered.

fields.Title: You: "Knock lightly."
fields.Dialogue Text: Knock lightly.

fields.Title: Door, Apartment #12: "The handle is loose from violent, f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The handle is loose from violent, fruitless yanking. Paint at the door's bottom is chipped from kicking. People have tried often, and apparently without success, to enter.

fields.Title: Door, Apartment #12: "No response."
fields.Dialogue Text: No response.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Don't let the quiet fool you -- the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't let the quiet fool you -- the beast is in there somewhere, ready to rip you to shreds with a broken bottle...

fields.Title: Interfacing: "How... how can this be?! How can su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How... how can this be?! How can such a simple chain defy our best efforts? Are you *that* bad with your hands? I do not understand...

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Fabric rustles. The lieutenant's ch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fabric rustles. The lieutenant's chin catches against his collar. He is looking on, shaking his head in disappointment.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And the place comes with three mon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And the place comes with three months' worth of utility bills."

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, don't look at me! You're the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, don't look at me! You're the one packing shitty chaincutters."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Nothing happens?! It must be an amb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing happens?! It must be an ambush... Let's get your adrenaline pumping, just in case.

fields.Title: You: ""I'll be honest: I'm just not that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll be honest: I'm just not that good with my hands."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course, officer." The lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, officer." The lieutenant smiles obligingly. "My RCM regulation, recently distributed cutters are the problem."

fields.Title: You: ""Looks like we found where Cuno's d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like we found where Cuno's dad lives." (Point to the bill on the door.)

fields.Title: You: ""These are no ordinary chains... th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "These are no ordinary chains... they are *titanium* chains. *Supreme-titanium*, Kim."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You can't stand for that! Come on,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can't stand for that! Come on, show him what you can REALLY do!

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Snip! So much for that goddamn chai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snip! So much for that goddamn chain. The links fall to the ground on the other side of the door. You have bested the titanium menace.

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The door is locked by a chain. If o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The door is locked by a chain. If only you had some kind of standard police device for the cutting of chains. Something, perhaps, that could be found in an RCM motor carriage...

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You can just go in now..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can just go in now...
